sentences.en: George sat at the head of the table, in his rightful place as their leader.
sentences.cn: 乔治坐在桌子上首，作为他们的领导，这是他理所当然的位子。

sentences.en: He claims to be the rightful heir.
sentences.cn: 他要求做合法的继承人.

sentences.en: He had been denied what he believed to be his rightful position at the center of things.
sentences.cn: 他被拒绝了他认为原应属于自己的中心地位。

sentences.en: I shall never have a rightful place.
sentences.cn: 我永远不会有合法地位.

sentences.en: I’ll return the money to its rightful owner .
sentences.cn: 我会把钱还给其合法的主人。

sentences.en: In the process of gaining our rightful place we must not be guilty of wrongful deeds.
sentences.cn: 在争取我们的合法地位的过程中,我们不应该因为错误的行为而自咎.

sentences.en: She claims ownership ( ie says she is the rightful owner ) of the land.
sentences.cn: 她对这块土地的产权提出要求 ( 称她是合法所有人 ).

sentences.en: She has a rightful claim to the property; it was her mother's.
sentences.cn: 这份财产 原 是她母亲的,她具有合法所有权.

sentences.en: The canoe was immediately returned to its rightful owners.
The car must be returned to its rightful owner.
sentences.cn: 这辆车必须归还给真正的主人。

sentences.en: The painting has been returned to its rightful owner .
sentences.cn: 这幅画已归还给合法所有权人。

sentences.en: The property was adjudged to the rightful owner.
sentences.cn: 财产判给了合法所有人.

sentences.en: the rightful heir to the throne
The stolen car was returned to its rightful owner .
sentences.cn: 被盗的汽车还给了其合法的主人。

sentences.en: There was a dispute about the rightful succession to the throne.
sentences.cn: 对于王位的合法继承权有过一场争论.

sentences.en: There will be a dispute about the rightful succession to her estate.
sentences.cn: 对于她产业的合法继承权将有一场争论.

sentences.en: Who is the rightful owner of this?
sentences.cn: 这个东西的合法所有人是谁?

sentences.en: Who shall abide the day of His ( the rightful one's coming )?
sentences.cn: 谁会等待真正主义到来的一天?

words.tran_cn: 作弊的，以不正当手段操纵的
正确地；恰当地；公正地；合适地
操纵，控制（rig的过去分词）；给（船等）装配帆；仓促安排
合法的；正当的；公正的；正直的

trans.tran_en: according to what is correct or what should be done legally or morally
